title: A Simple, Easy Idea to fix Ahri
body:
{{champion:103}}  is a tad overtuned at the moment. This is not a QQ thread saying how OP she is and how her win rate/pick rate are so high. I think her kit is actually healthy and fun to play as and has counterplay.

I think only one thing should be changed. **Her Q should give bonus movement speed ONLY if it hits an enemy.** I think that was the original purpose of the skill anyway: to help her kite. It definitely wasn't to help her chase or escape without her ult, which is what I think can be frustrating to deal with.

Would you rather Riot give in to the REAL QQ'ing a few patches from now and just gut her then?

Why not just half the movespeed boost if she doesn't hit a champion?

Her E and W were given higher dmg at the time to compensate. There was a reason that she had a 59% win rate after her "compensations" after DFG was removed.

I'd rather Riot just leave her alone, because she's fine. She's not that hard to play against. In fact, if they nerf her much more, she will be unplayable, because you really only need to avoid her charm to beat her. It's completely a L2P issue.
I main {{champion:103}}  and i find this nerf pretty reasonable.... upvote
This would balance her Q. Because it gets used a lot as a "free ghost" to run away or get close, I don't think that is a healthy mechanic.

What exactly does this change?

You consider her over tuned because she gets a brief movement speed boost? The "nerf" while fair will change nothing at all other then raise her skill floor very slightly.
It'll make it so she can't use it as a free movement speed boost when chasing a fleeing enemy or escaping, unless she actually hits something with her Q.

That doesn't accomplish anything, what is she suppose to do if she is escaping with low mana?

How is this making her overbearing?
Thats the point of the change is to give her a weakness, if she wastes all her mana then she shouldn't be able to escape freely just by spamming Q.
She has weaknesses all this does is add one which fixes nothing.
she doesn't have many weaknesses, other than needing to land skillshots which isn't really a weakness it is just playing the champion.

That and high mana costs, no sustain, reliance on her combo to do significant damage, weak CC, Squishy.

Nah the brief 0.5 second movement speed buff that rapidly decays is the problem.

She has sustain, she has hard CC, all champions that build full damage are squishy, and I wouldn't say it is a weakness that she has to land abilities to do damage (much like every mage).

Yes the speed buff was a huge buff to "compensate" for the DFG removal which is why she had a 59% win rate when it first happened and really strengthened her pre-6 which was previously her weakest point.
It was her getting buffs across the board coupled with being a flavor pick.
This will make her weak pre 6 (which is what her counterplay should be) because she can't just Q and run away from any danger.
Her counterplay is her reliance on skillshots and landing a charm. You simply dodge.

We can't just remove it without adding something else. That movespeed boost costed ahri 20% dmg amplification, range on W, R, and mana cost on Q.

I say give range back to W and R and I can do without ms boost

Did you not read what I said? I even bolded it to make it as easy to read as possible.

She still will have the movement speed boost, just only if she actually hits an enemy with it.

Part of the movespeed boost was so she could reposition in flight.  

Overall I think she's fine and GB needs something to whine about.
Well, that is a reasonable nerf, me like.
This is an outstanding idea. If Ahri mains don't think this is fair, gut her.

Haha, I wanted to propose a nerf that would both be fair to Ahri (she still can use the skill to kite as Riot wanted it to be when they introduced the MS boost) and fair to those who play against Ahri (she's legitimately vulnerable pre-6/if her ult is down).
Sounds like a reasonable compromise.
